title: Request Info  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Request Info Request Info about depaul Fill out a short form and receive information about our programs, the admissions process and upcoming admissions events. Select the option that best fits you to get started. Undergraduate Majors Get more information about DePaul if you are pursuing an undergraduate degree as a first-time college student or transfer student. Graduate Programs Receive information about one of our 170+ graduate programs, admission requirements and upcoming info sessions. Other Areas of Study Law Degrees Receive admission materials and updates from the College of Law for the JD, MLS or LLM programs. English Language Academy The English Language Academy (ELA) supports international and non-native English speakers with a variety of programs.
